name: Strafe
desc: Clinkz nimbly attacks with a barrage of arrows. Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time and grants Clinkz the ability to automatically dodge projectiles.

name: Grave Chill
desc: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.

name: Fervor
desc: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

name: Meat Hook
desc: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Hunter in the Night
desc: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness. Can be activated during night to grant Night Stalker flying movement for 2 seconds.

name: Chemical Rage
desc: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Insatiable Hunger
desc: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.

name: Smoke Screen
desc: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss most attacks, as well as slowing movement.

name: Tricks of the Trade
desc: CHANNELED - Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy heroes from behind in an area around him.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Ravage
desc: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
